[![](https://hostus.us/img/hotlink-ok/logo.png)](https://hostus.us)

Thank you for spending your time checking out our latest offer.

To celebrate the holiday season we are offering a basket full of holiday cheer at the best prices of year, with IPv4 and IPv6 space to be announced with any provider within your chosen RIR region.

**IPv4 Space** <del>$70</del> **just $60/month!**

    /24 IPv4 block (256 IPs)
    RIPE NCC region (Europe / Middle East)
    LOA on request

[Order Now](https://my.hostus.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=73)


**IPv6 Space** <del>$30</del> **now from $20/year!**

    /48 IPv6; larger sizes are available.
    Regions Available:
    - ARIN (North America)
    - APNIC (Asia Pacific)
    - AFRINIC (Africa)
    - RIPE NCC (Europe / Middle East)
    LOA on request
    Promo Code: L2V9JQLJR6

[Order Now](https://my.hostus.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=195)

Please note, NO SPAM | NO EMAIL MARKETING | NO BULK MAIL | NOTHING ILLEGAL to be hosted on these IPs. All orders are manually reviewed.

Have any questions? Please email sales@hostus.us. We look forward to hearing from you!

Best Regards,

Alexander
